text: Arieh Warshel (; born November 20, 1940) is an Israeli-American biochemist and biophysicist. He is the Dana and David Dornsife Chair in Chemistry at the University of Southern California. He received the 2013 Nobel Prize in Chemistry, together with Michael Levitt and Martin Karplus for "the development of multiscale models for complex chemical systems". ==Scientific organizations== Warshel is a member of the following scientific organizations: * Member of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States * Fellow of the Royal Society of Chemistry * Full Member of the USC Norris Cancer Center ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American biochemists Category:American physicists Category:Israeli biologists
title: Arieh Warshel
